results.title: France-To-Indore Robotic Surgery Breaks Medical Barriers; World’s First Transcontinental Bariatric Surgery Performed
results.summary: The Free Press Journal reports the world's first transcontinental bariatric surgery performed from France to India, utilizing the indigenously developed SSI Mantra 3 robotic system. "They demonstrate that geography is no longer a barrier to surgical expertise." While the article highlights technological advancements, discernment is advised, and focus should remain on Jesus Christ, the ultimate healer (Matthew 8:16-17).
